name: Streetball Fighter
description:
CAN ONLY BE PLAYED WITH CONTROLLERS

This game combines a typical fighting game with a dirty basketball match. 

The goal is to score points and you can either try to avoid the defender or knock him out with the  different moves and powers.  

You switch places playing offence then defense.

Try completing the tournament mode and defeating all the legendary Streetball Fighting players to become the champion, there's is a different ending for each difficulty level.
